summary: Completed comprehensive testing of QuickThumb SaaS thumbnail tool. Backend APIs functional with authentication working correctly. Frontend UI/UX is well-designed and responsive. Critical issues found with Gemini AI integration and Stripe checkout.

integration_issues.issue: Clicking 'Get 50 Credits' redirects to auth page instead of Stripe checkout

success_percentage: Backend: 60% (auth works, core features broken), Frontend: 90% (UI excellent, integration issues)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Gemini LlmChat initialization by adding system_message parameter. Update Stripe API key to valid test key. Investigate why Stripe checkout redirects to auth instead of payment flow.
